div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-11
CodeDisplay
XM2WV4Meningococcal vaccines
XM18Y8Meningococcus C, purified polysaccharides antigen conjugated

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
259840006Meningococcal polysaccharide group C antibody (substance)
871866001Vaccine product containing only Neisseria meningitidis serogroup C antigen (medicinal product)
951000221102Vaccine product containing only Neisseria meningitidis serogroup C capsular polysaccharide conjugated antigen (medicinal product)

description.value: Codes representing monovalent MenC conjugate values
